Articles.Content:
I am the kind of player who likes to look back at what I've done, primarily so I can go on missions to places I haven't yet been.  KSP1, in the R&D Archives allowed you to look at the different bodies and biomes and see what science you gained from which experiments, and this is sorely missing from KSP2.  I would like to see a system on the game that shows:

  • Science experiments collected by biome/location, complete with points gained
  • Flight data for every flight, to include when it flew, crew, distance, time, and whether or not it succeeded
  • Type of flight (rocket, spaceplane, submersible)

I am sure a mod could handle this, but it should be stock functionality.  In my opinion, anyhow.
